mapper.insert: insert into board( board_no, write, title, contents, category_no, member_no ) values ( board_no.nextval, #{write}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{categoryNo}, #{memberNo} )
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board where category_no = #{categoryNo} order by board_no desc)a) where rnum between ? and ?
